ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.tabular import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.4.0'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.tabular import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.4.0'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

name: autogluon.tabular
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "autogluon.tabular" %}
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 42e4838bb95328cedb54a9d094072068d8ce1e610a1154f91190b3670011561b

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install ./tabular -vv
  script_env:
    - RELEASE=1

requirements:
  build:
    # - {{ compiler('cuda') }}                 # [linux and cuda_compiler_version != "None"]
    - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - cython                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - numpy  >=1.25.0,<2.4.0                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
  run:
  # see deps in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/tabular/setup.py
  # dep versions defined in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/core/src/autogluon/core/_setup_utils.py
    - python >={{ python_min }},<3.13
    - numpy >=1.25.0,<2.4.0
    - scipy >=1.5.4,<1.17
    - pandas >=2.0.0,<2.4.0
    - pytorch >=2.2,<2.8   # pin lowerbound to 2.2 to avoid dependency resolution issue
    - scikit-learn >=1.4.0,<1.8.0
    - networkx >=3.0,<4
    - autogluon.core =={{ version }}
    - autogluon.features =={{ version }}
    - lightgbm >=4.0,<4.7
    - catboost >=1.2,<1.3
    - xgboost >=2.0,<3.1
    - fastai >=2.3.1,<2.9

test:
  imports:
    - autogluon.tabular
  commands:
    - python -c "from autogluon.tabular import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '{{ version }}'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"
  requires:
    - pip
    # - pytorch =*=cuda*  # [linux and cuda_compiler_version != "None"]

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/autogluon.tabular
  summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data
  dev_url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - shchur
    - Innixma
    - prateekdesai04
